page.title: 16Craftsmen today.Hoo area.
page.content:
WHEELWRIGHT. Monewden. Mr Clifford Arbon is no longer in full- time employment but still repairs wheels in the traditional way for the Kerr Estates who now own the wheelwright's shop.
BLACKSMITH. Brandeston. The smithy has been owned by the present family since 1623. Mr Moore works full-time & employs 3 other men.He and one man shoe on average 45 horses a week (mainly riding horses). They make all their own horse shoes and also make ornamental iron-work to order.The coal-fired furn- ace is re-kindled every morning. The other two employees repair farm machinery.
